preparation: Soak ¾ cup whole urad dal and ¼ cup kidney beans in water for 8 to 9 hours or overnight.
Drain urad dal and kidney beans.
Pressure cook for 18 to 20 whistles on a high flame, till both the urad dal and rajma have cooked thoroughly and softened.
In a blender or mixer jar place 2 large tomatoes or 200 grams of tomatoes, chopped.
In a pan, now heat 3 tbsp butter. you can use salted butter or unsalted butter.
Stir and saute the onions on a low flame till they become light golden.
Add the cooked urad dal and kidney beans along with the stock. Add 1 cup water or as required.
